post.body: T'is confusing. So am I speaking at your Manchester, UK event or what? ;)
- What the frack. Is that @SimonLeung hiding under that hideous orange layout? ;) Dude. UK event = me there already. WOOT!
Wake Up Productive is AMAZING. I'd say "go buy it", but it aint on the market no more. Sold out see. TRULY life-changing.
Correct knowledge isn't necessarily even power, if you don't DO anything with it. Action people... ACTION is power!
Good on ya' bro. And yeah. Couldn't sleep. Brace was hurting a heck of a lot. I'll be watching my e-mail. ;)
You're in San Diego dude? Met up with @FrankKern or @JasonMoffatt? ;)
Way tii nuch YouTube = big DL quotas. ;) That and the amount of marketing material I race through is crazy.
We pay for like 10GB a month and I average over 150. :) Then again, Virgin Media are so hopeless they probably don't realise.
Now less than 4k unread messages! Making serious progress. *cough* DELETE *cough*
A rather belated birthday tweet to the one and only @JoeVitale! P.S. Is it "vi-tal" or "vi-tal-ee"? Always conscious I'm saying it wrong. xD
Disaster Movie voted second worst film of all time... and rightly so!
New year's resolution: Get to AT LEAST one Internet Marketnig event. Preferably one in the UK, first. Then StomperNet it is. ;) @BradFallon
World's funniest joke = epic fail. http://www.reason.com/blog/show/114267.html
MAC USERS: My biggest software recommendation is 1PassWord. It's AWESOME. Free for Christmas too! http://givingtree.macheist.com/ @MacHeist
WTH?!?! Worst piece of advice I've ever been given: "The nicer you are the less money you make." Utter BS.
As the pound steadily gets crapper, I steadily make more money. God bless the USD.
Open call to Obama: Will interview you live on UStream. You game big boy? xD
Looking at videos of angry scientologists on YouTube. Those guys don't do themselves any favors.
Had about 3 IMers come to me now and tell me about this: http://live.webprosperity.com/ The fracking page doesn't make no sense. wth anyone?
I know I can't beat @PaulieSabol in an argument, but I'm tryna persuade him to start using Twitter a wee-bit more.
